ygData.subject: Re: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Dont worry, you will learn to hate it as the rest of us in due time :) -Sandortien
ygData.messageBody:
Dont worry, you will learn to hate it as the rest of us in due time :)

-Sandortien


>From: "Wopr" <inewton@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap
>Date: Tue, 14 Dec 1999 10:35:57 -0500
>
>From: "Wopr" <inewton@...>
>
>Last night I did my first tinkering of my gnomish career. I spent about
>60pp after selling back everything I made and raised my skill from 50 to
>58.
>
>If the skill cap is indeed (lvl * 5) - 13 (thanks Diabloklr) I have quite a
>way to go before my lvl 18 gnome wiz hits 77. Time to make some moola!!
>
>One thing I did learn last night. Tinkering rocks! I love it. I have
>never had so much fun with a trade skill. There are all kinds of things to
>make.
>
>Also, last night people asked to buy a spyglass, cams, and a compass from
>me
>when they heard I was trying to tinker. So there is a market for some of
>this stuff even though the market may be small.
>
>Wopr <Valiant Souls>
>gnome wizard
>Bertoxxulous
>
>
